title: Dark elven dagger (EvilHack)
data:
- - *For the weapon in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), see [droven dagger](/wiki/Droven_dagger "Droven dagger").*
  - *For the weapon in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), see [dark elven dagger (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Dark_elven_dagger_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Dark elven dagger (SLASH'EM)").*

| ) [![Dark elven dagger.png](/images/5/56/Dark_elven_dagger.png)](/wiki/File:Dark_elven_dagger.png) |                                                         |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                               | dark elven dagger                                       |
| Appearance                                                                                         | etched dagger                                           |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                   | 1d5                                                     |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                   | 1d3                                                     |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                       | +2                                                      |
| Weapon skill                                                                                       | [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger")                         |
| Size                                                                                               | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                                         | 10 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                             | [8](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                              |
| Material                                                                                           | [adamantine](/wiki/Adamantine "Adamantine")             |

A **dark elven dagger** is a type of [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is a [stackable](/wiki/Stackable "Stackable") one-handed weapon that can be wielded in melee and thrown, and uses the [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"). It is made of [adamantine](/wiki/Adamantine "Adamantine"), and appears as an **etched dagger** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven dagger, and any drow character in a role that starts the game with one or more daggers will receive the same amount of dark elven daggers.

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") [soldiers](/wiki/Soldier "Soldier") and [watchmen](/wiki/Watchmen "Watchmen") have a 1⁄3 chance of [generating with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a dark elven dagger paired with a [dark elven hand crossbow](/wiki/Dark_elven_hand_crossbow "Dark elven hand crossbow") and [dark elven crossbow bolts](/wiki/Dark_elven_crossbow_bolt "Dark elven crossbow bolt"), and non-[undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead") drow have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a dark elven dagger, with the exception of [drow clerics](/index.php?title=Drow_cleric\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow cleric (page does not exist)").

A dark elven dagger can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 [dark elven arrows](/wiki/Dark_elven_arrow_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven arrow (EvilHack)") and 2 [dark elven crossbow bolts](/wiki/Dark_elven_crossbow_bolt "Dark elven crossbow bolt") while the forge square is darkened.

## Description

A dark elven dagger can be used at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") to create several of items:

- A dark elven dagger can be combined with 2 [dark elven crossbow bolts](/wiki/Dark_elven_crossbow_bolt "Dark elven crossbow bolt") while the forge is darkened to create a [dark elven short sword](/wiki/Dark_elven_short_sword_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven short sword (EvilHack)").
- A dark elven dagger can be combined with 2 dark elven arrows while the forge is darkened to create a [dark elven spear](/wiki/Dark_elven_spear "Dark elven spear").
- A dark elven dagger can be combined with a dark elven short sword while the forge is darkened to create a [dark elven broadsword](/wiki/Dark_elven_broadsword "Dark elven broadsword").
- 2 dark elven daggers can be combined while the forge is darkened to create a [dark elven mace](/wiki/Dark_elven_mace "Dark elven mace").
- A dark elven dagger can be combined with a dark elven mace to create [dark elven bracers](/wiki/Dark_elven_bracers "Dark elven bracers").

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_elven_dagger_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit)*
html:
Dark elven dagger (EvilHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the weapon in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, see droven dagger.
For the weapon in SLASH'EM, SpliceHack and SlashTHEM, see dark elven dagger (SLASH'EM).
)
Name dark elven dagger
Appearance etched dagger
Damage vs. small 1d5
Damage vs. large 1d3
To-hit bonus +2
Weapon skill dagger
Size one-handed
Base price 10 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 8
Material adamantine

A dark elven dagger is a type of weapon that appears in EvilHack. It is a stackable one-handed weapon that can be wielded in melee and thrown, and uses the dagger skill. It is made of adamantine, and appears as an etched dagger when unidentified.

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven dagger, and any drow character in a role that starts the game with one or more daggers will receive the same amount of dark elven daggers.

Drow soldiers and watchmen have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a dark elven dagger paired with a dark elven hand crossbow and dark elven crossbow bolts, and non-undead drow have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a dark elven dagger, with the exception of drow clerics.

A dark elven dagger can be created at a forge by combining 2 dark elven arrows and 2 dark elven crossbow bolts while the forge square is darkened.

Description

A dark elven dagger can be used at a forge to create several of items:

  • A dark elven dagger can be combined with 2 dark elven crossbow bolts while the forge is darkened to create a dark elven short sword.
  • A dark elven dagger can be combined with 2 dark elven arrows while the forge is darkened to create a dark elven spear.
  • A dark elven dagger can be combined with a dark elven short sword while the forge is darkened to create a dark elven broadsword.
  • 2 dark elven daggers can be combined while the forge is darkened to create a dark elven mace.
  • A dark elven dagger can be combined with a dark elven mace to create dark elven bracers.
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''dark elven dagger''' is a type of [[weapon]] that appears in [[EvilHack]]. It is a [[stackable]] one-handed weapon that can be wielded in melee and thrown, and uses the [[dagger]] [[skill]]. It is made of [[adamantine]], and appears as an '''etched dagger''' when [[identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven dagger, and any drow character in a role that starts the game with one or more daggers will receive the same amount of dark elven daggers.

[[Drow (monster attribute)|Drow]] [[soldier]]s and [[watchmen]] have a {{frac|3}} chance of [[Monster starting inventory|generating with]] a dark elven dagger paired with a [[dark elven hand crossbow]] and [[dark elven crossbow bolt]]s, and non-[[undead]] drow have a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with a dark elven dagger, with the exception of [[drow cleric]]s.

A dark elven dagger can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining 2 [[Dark elven arrow (EvilHack)|dark elven arrows]] and 2 [[dark elven crossbow bolt]]s while the forge square is darkened.

==Description==
A dark elven dagger can be used at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] to create several of items:

* A dark elven dagger can be combined with 2 [[dark elven crossbow bolt]]s while the forge is darkened to create a [[Dark elven short sword (EvilHack)|dark elven short sword]].
* A dark elven dagger can be combined with 2 dark elven arrows while the forge is darkened to create a [[dark elven spear]].
* A dark elven dagger can be combined with a dark elven short sword while the forge is darkened to create a [[dark elven broadsword]].
* 2 dark elven daggers can be combined while the forge is darkened to create a [[dark elven mace]].
* A dark elven dagger can be combined with a dark elven mace to create [[dark elven bracers]].
